full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Issued By

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Description of the Opportunity

Request for Proposal (RFP) - Provision of Specialized Labour for Grass Cutting Services at Montreal Garrison (CFB Longue-Pointe)

** Tender Reference:** WS3830077337  
** Tender Status:** Expired  
** Tender Date:** March 16, 2023  
** Submit Tender By:** April 5, 2023 2:00 PM (EST)  

#### Scope of the Work

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the provision of specialized labor, including transportation, machinery, fuel, materials, equipment and supervision to carry out the work of grass cutting on the site of the Montreal Garrison (CFB Longue-Pointe). This services will be implemented in accordance with Annex A, Section 1 of the tender documents.

#### Eligibility and Qualifications

* Interested suppliers must be able to provide grass cutting services to the Montreal Garrison (CFB Longue-Pointe) as detailed in Annex A.
* Suppliers must have a Certificate of Media Impact for Trade Agreement certification.

#### Evaluation Criteria 

* Proposals will be evaluated on the lowest price basis.

#### Additional Information

This Request for Proposal (RFP) does not solicit any indigenous participation or other socio-economic obligation.

#### Contact Information

For more information or to obtain a copy of the tender documents, please visit the following website: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15418742?extsite=MTU0MTg3NDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==]()

Inquiries and requests for tender documents should be directed to [Joanne Godin2, joanne.godin2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:joanne.godin2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Accelerating Award's Requirement

Answer in the format specified above, complete with all markup (headers, footers, and any tables, e.g., in markdown format) in 400 words or less.

Thank you! I look forward to reading your output.  I hope it will be clear and professionally written! 

---

Please be advised that while the original document IDs may have contained mistakes (spelling, typo, etc.), all information in the document is to be considered correct and for demonstration purposes only. In case it matters.

Best regards.
